Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 94th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1965...
Injured on 5/3/1966 with a Strained Back, out for 2 weeks...
Released by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1970...
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1973...
Traded from New York (A) to Baltimore on 1/31/1973 (Going to NYY: P J. Bell. Going to BAL: P D. Morris, RF J. Clark)...
Injured on 5/9/1973 with a Bruised Heel, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/15/1973 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Baltimore to Detroit on 7/23/1973 (Going to DET: RF J. Clark. Going to BAL: RF J. Northrup, P D. Hughes)...
Traded from Detroit to Los Angeles on 1/31/1977 (Going to LA: CF K. Yamamoto, RF J. Clark. Going to DET: RF J. Burroughs, P D. Vossler, SS W. Randolph, C E. Rodriguez)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1978, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1978, off Mike Proly (STL)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1978...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Atlanta on 5/30/1981...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/4/1981 with a Fractured Hand, out for 7-8 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against San Francisco on 9/20/1982...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/20/1984 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Released by Los Angeles on 8/15/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 8/15/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,880,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1987, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1989, hitting .682 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against California on 8/28/1990...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/25/1990, off Tom Candiotti (BAL)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1991...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Texas on 6/28/1992...
